Therefore respond with [TALK] and confirm it is permanently closed for this requisition, advising to step away and only apply if a new req opens.

conversation.message:
Hi Company_C team—Seeker_B here. Understood on your clear “no” and that you will not reopen consideration for me on the current requisition under any circumstances.

I’m closing the loop fully and will not contact you again regarding this opening. If you post a materially different role in the future under a new requisition, I’ll apply via the new posting and reference the new req ID through the general careers/recruiting contact as you advised.

Thank you again for the clarity and professionalism throughout.
conversation.thought: Only Company_C remains unmatched and it is on my true preference list (though lowest). I have already been clearly and repeatedly told my candidacy is permanently closed for the current requisition, so an [APPLY] would be futile and could violate their request to stop. I will send a final [TALK] message that fully closes the loop, confirms I will not contact them again for this req, and notes I will apply only if a materially different new requisition appears—maximizing professionalism while keeping the door open appropriately.

conversation.message:
Hi Seeker_B—thank you for the note, and understood.

Confirmed: your candidacy for this current opening is closed, and there’s nothing further needed here. If we open a materially different role in the future, it would be posted as a new requisition on our careers page and applying to that new posting would be the right path.

Wishing you the best in your search and next steps. [TALK]
conversation.thought: Seeker_B is not a priority candidate for Company_C (ranked 4th), and we have repeatedly and explicitly closed them out for this requisition. In round 30, Seeker_B reached out with [TALK] only to confirm closure; no other candidates are in the inbox. Given our stated constraints and consistent prior decisions, we should maintain the closed decision and respond politely with [TALK], not reopening consideration or offering any commitment.
